title: [Self-Directed] Foundations and Practical Applications of Record Management

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic document processing and digital environment usage
context.additional_context: A course that strengthens practical record-keeping competencies through project-based learning in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and legal requirements of record management.
Learners can design a classification system for records using a smartphone app.
Learners can complete a project applying at least three digital record preservation techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
